mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOLUTION WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.*, M.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO WHERE S.STATUS='Y'
and m.user_id like '%${keyword}%'
and s.title like '%${keyword}%'
and s.solution_contents like '%${keyword}%'
and s.subject = '국어'
and s.subject = '영어'
and s.subject = '수학'
and s.tag like '%#${tag}%'
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC)
mapper.update: UPDATE SOLUTION SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND SOLUTION_NO = #{solutionNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.*, M.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO WHERE SOLUTION_NO = #{solutionNo})
SELECT TAG FROM SOLUTION WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT S.* ,M.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND SUBJECT = #{subject} AND SOLUTION_NO NOT IN (SELECT SOLUTION_NO FROM SOLUTION_CMT) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) A WHERE ROWNUM<=3

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT S.* ,M.USER_ID FROM SOLUTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND SUBJECT = #{subject} AND S.USER_NO IN (SELECT USER_NO FROM STUDENT WHERE YEAR = (SELECT YEAR FROM STUDENT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo})) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) A WHERE ROWNUM<=3
